title: AI Transcription
description: This web app showcases an AI-powered speech-to-text workflow that accepts recorded or uploaded audio, transcribes it with modern ASR models, and lets users review and export polished transcripts.

title: Net Inspector
description: This diagnostic dashboard runs latency checks, port probes, and traceroutes to surface real-time network health insights with lightweight visual summaries for quick troubleshooting.

title: Random Password Generator
description: This web-based application is designed to generate random passwords combining lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers, and symbols. The application provides a high level of usability and security with support for a password length of 8-16 characters. Each password generated is unique, so ensuring a high  security.

title: DAiLY TO dO ApP
description: This is an easy-to-use, user-friendly Todo app designed to boost productivity by helping manage tasks effectively. With features like effortless task management, task status at a glance, instant task removal, and persistent storage, this web-based app provides a clean, minimal design ensuring a seamless experience for tracking your tasks across any platform.

title: countdown-and-stopwatch-timer
description: This project includes a simple user interface that provides both countdown and stopwatch timer functionality. It allows users to measure the time and set countdowns as per their requirements.

title: simple calculator
description: This project is a simple calculator that provides basic arithmetic calculations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and a clear function. It helps users in performing quick calculations with a user-friendly interface.

title: Evergreen-Impex
description: This website provides information about the services offered by the Evergreen-Impex company. The site provides a comprehensive overview of the company and its services, making it easier for customers to find the services they need.

title: AnalogClock
description: This project is an analog clock created using HTML, CSS, and JS. The clock provides an accurate display of the time in an aesthetically pleasing format.
